EmailTemplate.subject: Navigating enterprise Kubernetes and cloud-native transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
With VMworld Europe behind us, now is the time to accelerate your Cloud-Native transformation. With enterprise-ready technology from VMware and Pivotal your company has the opportunity to reap the benefits of deploying Kubernetes in production without the complexity. Building on the proven foundations of Pivotal Cloud Foundry and integrated directly into your existing VMware infrastructure, Pivotal Container Service is your easy-button for enterprise Kubernetes.
The momentum around VMware and Pivotal’s collaboration on the award winning Pivotal Container Service <[[https://www.crn.com/rankings-and-lists/ti2018-details.htm?c=55utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-vmworld-Barcelona-spain-Q418]]> continues to accelerate, as demonstrated by the news, customer talks and technical break-out sessions at the conference. In case you missed out, find out about our top picks from the show here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/vmware-kubernetes?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-vmworld-Barcelona-spain-Q418]]>.
We also invite you to take advantage of our growing library of resources <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-container-service-pks?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-vmworld-Barcelona-spain-Q418]]> to help you on your Kubernetes journey, whatever stage you’re at. Find out more from our resource center here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/vmware-vmworld?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-vmworld-Barcelona-spain-Q418]]>. In the future, Kubernetes will likely be part of your IT portfolio, so set yourself up for success with PKS.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
